Author: Staramba
Title: [ANN][ICO] «Staramba» World‘s 1st Social VR Universe
Body: What is STARAMBA all about? Understand what we do and how you can participate and profit.   ► Staramba is creating the first ultra-realistic virtual reality social network with features and experiences built around the world’s biggest celebrities, athletes, and musicians! ► In this VR world, called STARAMBA.spaces, you can meet friends and stars, walk around, go shopping, networking, chatting, visiting clubs, movies, events, stars — and much more! Better than in the real world! ► Creator of the 3D Instagraph scanner — the world’s most advanced 3D scanning technology — which transform the world’s biggest stars into hyper-realistic VR avatars  Do you have a working product? ► The 3D Instagraph is an incredible high-resolution 3D scanner which has already created three-dimensional scans of athletes, musicians, celebrities for Hollywood movies and best-selling video games.  ► STARAMBA.spaces is in the alpha phase, with an invitation-only beta starting after the ITO. Check out some in-game footage  How big is your team and company? ► Staramba employs more than 100 experts from over 23 countries in the Berlin and Los Angeles offices.  What can I do with the Staramba Crypto-Token? ► The STARAMBA.token will be used for all transactions within their VR universe such as buying and selling goods and services in game — even a massive virtual real estate market! ► The token could also serve as a way to crowdfund large projects in the VR world, such as stadiums or concert venues. ► You can trade tokens on exchanges to new STARAMBA.spaces users and platform brands — or just hodl and sell at crypto-exchanges later- just like other ERC20 tokens.  What about the Token Price and projected value? ► The token price is $0.07 — $0.10 during the ITO. ► The platform will launch with a $1/token purchasing power — a projected increase of at least 10x for ITO investors before STT begins trading on exchanges. Read more about the token value  How much was contributed so far? ► So far, 39% of the total amount of crowdsale tokens have been sold with 2 weeks to go in the ITO — resulting in $21,237,775 USD (*) Total tokens sold will depend on completion of pending transactions and KYC verification. USD amount is calculated based on the claimed number of tokens and the full ITO price of the tokens.  Who are the partners of STARAMBA SE? ► Staramba is partnered with thousands of athletes, musicians and celebrities who have agreed to have themselves scanned into our ever-growing database of high-resolution 3D models — as well as official licensing partners such as REAL MADRID, FC BAYERN MUNICH, KISS, PARIS HILTON, HULK HOGAN, TIMO BOLL, DFB, ENGLISH FA, NFL PA, LINKIN PARK and many many more large brands.  How can I profit as ITO participant? ► Up to 14x profit on exchanges after platform launch for ITO investors. ► Buy land, build a store on that land and sell products for continuous income. ► Rent land to another user to generate passive income. ► Crowdfund large projects in the VR world, becoming a shareholder in future profits from the project  Visit Staramba.com for more information.

Author: Staramba
Title: [ANN][ICO] «Staramba» World‘s 1st Social VR Universe
Body: Staramba has many partnerships in place with major brands and even more are excited about the platform. When they see the excitement behind the ITO, they are ready to jump in.  The value of the tokens will be at 1 USD because the price of the products and services in-world will be valued essentially 1 STT for 1 USD. In other words, the brands price is $1/STT.  That's also the pricing they will need to maintain when selling real-world products on the platform.  If Adidas sells a pair of shoes on spaces, the rate they will charge in STT will be equal to $1/STT.    If the market rate dips below that, then people will run to exchanges to buy STT and get a discount on the real world goods available on the platform.  That demand will push the price back up to $1/STT  The idea is to award ITO investors with the bonus, so that by the time that brands and their fans are introduced to Staramba.spaces, they will pay the market value by purchasing tokens at 1USD value for 1STT for products.  There is more on that topic here: https://medium.com/@Staramba/projected-stt-token-increase-in-value-3e104897a4df

Author: Staramba
Title: [ANN][ICO] «Staramba» World‘s 1st Social VR Universe
Body: Facts about the upcoming STARAMBA ITO. Reasons to participate!  ++ 1st stock-corporation launching its token-sale ++  2 DAYS LEFT UNTIL THE STARAMBA ITO STARTS. GET READY FOR JUNE 20th 1 PM CET   Staramba’s Initial Token offering starts very soon and the excitement is building. 35,000+ people have signed up to be whitelisted for the pre-sale and two airdrop bonus tokens have already been delivered to early supporters in preparation for the sale.  Staramba is not like other token sales though. Below are some facts to help you get ready to buy your tokens and help you understand what makes the Staramba ITO such a great investment.   ESSENTIAL FACTS  1. When does the ITO start?  ITO Start Date: June 20th, 2018 — 1 PM CET  ITO End Date: July 25th, 2018 — 1 PM CET  Countdown timer at www.staramba.com   2. How much are Staramba tokens?  The ITO token price is $.10, but ITO investors are eligible for the following pre-sale discounts:  Phase 1: June 20th — June 27th 1pm CET — Price $0.07  Phase 2: June 27th — July 4th 1pm CET — Price $0.08  Phase 3: July 4th — July 11th 1pm CET — Price $0.09  Phase 4: July 11th — July25th 1pm CET — Price $0.10   3. Which countries can invest? The Staramba ITO is open to investors around the world with the exception of a few regulated countries:  United States of America (only accredited investors may participate, completed accreditation form will be required in order to complete KYC)  The People’s Republic of China (Hong Kong, Taiwan, Macau are allowed)  Singapor / Bosnia and Herzegovina / The Democratic People’s Republic of Korea / Ethiopia / Iran / Iraq / Sri Lanka / Syria / Trinidad and Tobago / Tunisia / Vanuatu / Yemen / Cuba   4. What currency can I use to buy tokens?  We accept cryptocurrency payments in BTC and ETH as well as USD through Bank Transfer.  We hope to get the Credit Card payment function running in the coming days.  Please be sure to make all payments directly through the Staramba ITO portal to avoid any risk of phishing.   5. How this ITO is different from others  Staramba is not a start-up hoping to scale and build something for the first time. We are a successful company that believes in the value of crypto and the ICO investment community to kickstart a game-changing project.  Staramba is a publicly traded company on the German stock market  Over 100 employees work for Staramba  Top licensing partners like Real Madrid, Bayern Munich, Paris Hilton, Hulk Hogan, NFL PA, KISS, Slash, Konami, DFB, English FA, Marilyn Monroe, BVB and business partners such as BerlinValley, Bravado, kicker, jbc, Tivela, Paragon, Bundesverband Deutsche Startups and many more.

Author: RemyLango
Title: [ANN][ICO] «Staramba» World‘s 1st Social VR Universe
Body: Good day everyone.  Please read the following analysis before you invest in Staramba token sale.  Introduction  I am writing this because I thought that Staramba is going to be a great investment opportunity for me and my investment partners but after some extensive research and discussion with the admin of the telegram channel I have come to some pretty strong conclusions for myself.  Now, I am not going to say what my conclusions are because I do not wanna see myself sued for defamation but you can make your own conclusions based on this research. For me it was enough but you are in control of your money and you decide if it is worth it for you or not.   My initial investment strategy  This company is listed on stock exchanges compared to other companies doing ICOs so that was on the plus side. 1. I decided to start by buying some shares into the company because generally speaking, with their projected sales for 2018 plus the revenue from the ICO, their market capitalization should have been 5 times bigger than at the time i bought the shares. 2. I would await for the sales numbers of the first day of the ICO and give the go to my partners to aquire tokens.  Where it all fell apart.  Few days before the start of the ICO and also on the first day of the ICO there was a huge spike in shares sell. I have suspected that something is not right considering their previous volume so I have looked into the graphs and who actually sold the shares.  http://prntscr.com/jxcqhs   By doing a research I have noticed that Christian Daudert, the CEO of Staramba owned ~10% of the shares but he also owned ~25% more of staramba shares but in a different entity. A company called: 11 Champions AG. He is also the CEO of that. You can check that information on:  http://prntscr.com/jxcq6o  I have thought that this is just a pump strategy (sell the shares, buy tokens, claim how much you sold in the first day to wow the crypto investors to make them buy a lot on the second day) but then I have started to look into the other share holders of Staramba especially Rolf Elgeti (~29%). By looking into this picture you will notice that is guy is a director of probably more than 500 companies:  http://prntscr.com/jxcrbi  No human person in this world can be a director of 500 companies. Not because you can't own the shares but because you can't even attend the shareholder meetings or come up with anything good to boost the company revenue cause you would'nt even have the time available in a day for that.  What I did was the confront the admin of the group and you can find the transcript in this print screen. http://prntscr.com/jxcsqv http://prntscr.com/jxct2f http://prntscr.com/jxct8e  After this, 10 seconds later, I am prohibited to talk on the main ICO chat. http://prntscr.com/jxcshd  I would like to mention that I have discussed with Clay in multiple ocasions because our investment funds are quite bigger compared to the majority of the ico investors so if this might look like normal to you, I can assure that when someone is offering you the kind of money for tokens and shares that we were offering to them, they wouldn't want to discuss in this matter unless something is really shady.   Again, everyone decides for themselves because its your own money.  I am just sharing information that you can simply google and find online on your own.

Author: 8okrates
Title: [ANN][ICO] «Staramba» World‘s 1st Social VR Universe
Body: @ RemyLango  When you look at staramba, it is just a small cap with a small freefloat. Volume is very low. At the moment the large investors cannot get out over the stock macket.  But you actually missed the story of the stock. The problem is the following ad-hoc from 05-25-18  "Due to audit obstacles, the auditors refuse to approve the annual financial statements and management report for 2017"  As we all know, this is something maket doesnt like at all. So the quote crashed from 65 to 30. Elgeti and Daudert have been buying some shares to retsore confidence. Quotes have been above 40 recently. Annual financial statements and management report for 2017 have been scheduled for 06/22 but were postponed to 06/29. So that might be the reason for the drop in the last days. We will see how the story ends in the next days.   Where did you get the information that 11 champions or Daudert have been selling shares? I havent seen anything like this.   Concerning Mr. Egleti and his "500" companies: He is just a director of a few "AGs". The other 95% probably dont need any meeting and are not operating shells.   I have more concern about the product.  They have a very very long way to go to reach their aims. I have seen no other characters in the spaces. Just maybe a star standing around. There is no real interaction. You can not move around. They want to be social vr. But I havent seen any multi user experience. I would say, they are 2 years away from a working product.

Author: Staramba
Title: [ANN][ICO] «Staramba» World‘s 1st Social VR Universe
Body: Hi There, Depends on how you define bounty program.  **We do have a referral program**. That means, for each successfully invited friend, a user will get 2 Bonus Leondrino. Users can earn Bonus Leondrino by inviting your friends to create a Leondrino Wallet and open a STARAMBA.Token account before the Staramba ITO.  Users can share their individual invitation link on the following channels: - WhatsApp - Twitter - Facebook - LinkedIn - Google+ - Xing  or send a personal invitation link via email using the invite friends function within their Leondrino Wallet.  As soon as the invited friends have successfully registered **using the invitation link** (in social media posts or email), the inviting user will get Bonus Leondrino that can be converted into the branded tokens of his choice (in our case STT) at any time.  **HINT**: users have to make sure that the invited friend uses the invitation link to register. If not, the system is not able to check who's friend it is and distribute the Bonus Leondrino to the inviting user.  ______  **We do have Airdrops** There are two ways to benefit from Airdrops:   - users can convert Bonus Leondrino into STARAMBA.Tokens. During three airdrop events you benefit from your early contribution because the balance of your STT account will be multiplied. First event took place on 05.06.2018 the Vision Factor Event. The number of STT tokens earned before Vision Factor were multiplied by 2. Next events will be on 12.06.2018 - the Early Bird Factor Airdrop. This time, the number of STT tokens earned before Early Bird Factor will be multiplied by 1.75. The third and final Airdrop will rain on 19.06.2018 and is called Momentum Factor. That day, the number of STT tokens earned before Momentum Factor will be multiplied by 1.5.  That means, the more successfully invited friends a user has, the more STARAMBA.Token he will get.    - Users can collect additional STARAMBA.Tokens as Bonus for supporting Staramba community building via individual content in form of photos, videos or stories. Details and updates about such supporting activities and appropriate Bonuses will be published on STARAMBA social channels and on Staramba's Brand Page in the Leondrino Wallet  on Friday this week (June .

Title: [ANN][ICO] «Staramba» World‘s 1st Social VR Universe
Body: I like this concept: its very easy to see at least a niche demand for this kind of VR stuff.  The project seems a promising one, in that the team is also very specialised and already at work on the project. The company behind this venture us already operational in allied projects.  Then, there's also all those pics of Paris Hilton, (influencer/advisor?). I dunno, but they do seem to have at least 'some' impact.  Yeah, good to go!

Author: actueal
Title: [ANN][ICO] «Staramba» World‘s 1st Social VR Universe
Body: I am interested. I am also a fan of 'Ready Player One' styled VR. But, investment-wise, the question is: Is there a sufficient demand in the world for this 'game', now or in 5,10 years?  Also, unlike several other announcements, there doesn't seem to be a lot of activity on this thread.  But, from my angle, you are definitely a buy and hold.

Author: cybercash
Title: [ANN][ICO] «Staramba» World‘s 1st Social VR Universe
Body: Look again now 30k telegram members and still rising... Link of whitepaper is working.  They answer all your questions I don't see any lack of communication.

Author: foobar123
Title: [ANN][ICO] «Staramba» World‘s 1st Social VR Universe
Body: yeah but a crytpocurrency without a reddit community is no cryptocurrency.  Who should they have as a community ?  The few Enthusiasts/Gamers who have a VR headset + capable PC ?  No Reddit. No Buy.

Title: [ANN][ICO] «Staramba» World‘s 1st Social VR Universe
Body: I see the sale of coins on this project has several phases of ICO with the price of coins that always increases with some bonus given, does this project develop bounty campaign?

Author: Staramba
Title: [ANN][ICO] «Staramba» World‘s 1st Social VR Universe
Body: To be clear investing in the ITO is the actual pre-sale. You can gain discounts during the ITO, which the benefit of being whitelisted so you can get on the newsletter and be directly notified of updates and when the discounts end. This is the only chance to invest at a discount June 20th-July 25th. Otherwise anyone can participate in the public ILO later when the stable token price is expected to be 1-1.4 USD.  Here is the ITO token price schedule: The ITO token price is $.10, but ITO investors are eligible for the following pre-sale discounts:     Phase 1: June 20th — June 27th 1pm CET — Price $0.07     Phase 2: June 27th — July 4th 1pm CET — Price $0.08     Phase 3: July 4th — July 11th 1pm CET — Price $0.09     Phase 4: July 11th — July25th 1pm CET — Price $0.10

Author: Staramba
Title: [ANN][ICO] «Staramba» World‘s 1st Social VR Universe
Body: Thanks for your support. We have some of the highest quality scanning technology in the industry and are prepared to develop the most diverse and compatible social universe. Paris is an investor in Staramba. She is also one of our partners.
